Articles.Content:
Starting point: Kerbin

Destination: Jool moon of your choice

Get there efficiently by using as much (useful) slingshots as possible.

No modparts/mechjeb. Explain your route, give us the amount of fuel used, the total mission time and some nice screenshots.

Bonus (prefer this to absolute efficiency):

- ridiculously unconventional and complicated routes

- ridiculous and unconventional rocket design

Do it like a kerbonaut.
